text: The Razer Blade Pro RZ09-02202E75-R3U1 17.3" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 2 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Razer Blade Pro RZ09-02202E75-R3U1 17.3" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 2 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The Razer Blade Pro RZ09-02202E75-R3U1 17.3" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 2 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the port selection could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Cyberpunk 2077, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Razer Blade Pro RZ09-02202E75-R3U1 17.3" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 2 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. The speakers is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Razer Blade Pro RZ09-02202E75-R3U1 17.3" FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 2 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
